reviewText: Love,Love,Love,the story line..so cute..I watched it 6 times already..in a week..

The subs are a little different from what I was used to.
Example: Gambatte mas!=I'm ready!
I rather like the version I'm used to, as in:
I, Kobato will do my very best!
Also, in the opening: I surprise myself
in how much I believe in tomorrow
My comfy version: I believe in my amazing future
One might be more accurate, but one definitely
Has the upper hand on elegance of phrase.

So I read a lot of reviews on Kabato before I thought about buying it. I haven't read the manga, but this anime has become one of my all time favorites. I just finished watching it and I already want to watch it again. That has honestly never happened. Like usually I watch an anime and then I'm ready for the next anime. But this one is very Very good. The graffics are very nice. The song is addicting. And the love story is very cute. I give a 10 outa 10

Me and my boyfriend cried pretty badly at the end. Well I cried pretty badly, but he teared up. I'm not going to tell you if the ending is sad or happy but if it doesn't tug at your heartstrings you have some issues.

The perfect love story.
